Method Detail

apply

protected Expression apply(SmallStepProofContext context,
                           Application application,
                           Expression e1,
                           Expression e2)
Similar in its nature to the AbstractSmallStepProofRuleSet.evaluate(SmallStepProofContext, Expression) method, but is used to evaluate applications. This method determines the class of the e1 (i.e. Lambda for lambda abstractions) and then looks for a method named applyClass (i.e. applyLambda for lambda abstractions). The method is passed the context, the application, e1 and e2. If no such method exists, a method for the parent class of the application will be search and so on. If no method is found, the application will be returned and context will not be modified.

Parameters:
context - the small step proof context.
application - the application.
e1 - the first expression of the application.
e2 - the second expression of the application.
Returns:
the resulting expression.
See Also:
evaluateApplication(SmallStepProofContext, Application)

evaluateApplication

public Expression evaluateApplication(SmallStepProofContext context,
                                      Application application)
Evaluates the application using the context.

Parameters:
context - the small step proof context.
application - the application to evaluate.
Returns:
the resulting expression.

applyLambda

public Expression applyLambda(SmallStepProofContext context,
                              Application application,
                              Lambda lambda,
                              Expression v)
Applies the (BETA-V) rule to the application.

Parameters:
context - the small step proof context.
application - the application.
lambda - the first operand of the application.
v - the second operand of the application.
Returns:
the resulting expression.
